name: Mission Space (Km4909)
description:
This my 2D shooter Build. 

Credits 

Maddie Klitsch 

Modifications 

1) Speed of the gun decreases as you level up. Making it harder to shoot your enemies. 

2) Changed the fonts and music for all levels.

3) Decreased the number of lives you get as you increase levels. I also added more enemies as you level up.
